document_data.name: Dhimar
document_data.mainbody: '''Dhimar''' was a worshiper and former high [[priest]] of [[Myrkul]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: While he had once been powerful, Dhimar received no [[spell]]s from his dead god.
document_data.Activities: Dhimar oversaw the [[Temple of Myrkul (Bezantur)|Temple of Myrkul]] in the [[Thayan]] city of [[Bezantur]], and continued to maintain it long after Myrkul's death during the [[Time of Troubles]] of [[1358 DR]]. He refused to convert to the worship of [[Cyric]] or [[Kelemvor]], and instead clung to the god for whom he had once served as a high priest. As of the late 1360s DR, he was believed to be the last devotee of Myrkul left in [[Faer√ªn]].
